title: I would scream in my sleep: Women from Syria's Alawite minority tell of kidnap and rape
summary_full: The BBC hears harrowing accounts of assaults appearing to target the sect of former President Assad.
summary_public: The BBC hears harrowing accounts of assaults appearing to target the sect of former President Assad.
